price: 你应当在这部经典里提及麦尔彦，当时她离开了自己的家属而到东边一个地方。
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مَرۡيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتۡ مِنۡ أَهۡلِهَا مَكَانٗا شَرۡقِيّٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi maryama idhi intabadhat min ahlihā makānan sharqiyyan
